title: 3D Interactive Game
summary: An immersive browser-based 3D experience built with Three.js, WebGL, and React. Features real-time rendering, optimized assets, and interactive camera controls.

title: Craft CMS â€” Table Tennis League
summary: Full-stack web platform built with Craft CMS and a Next.js front end. Features headless CMS architecture, and Docker-based deployment on Oracle Cloud.

title: Escape Room IoT
summary: Interactive IoT-based escape room project using Raspberry Pi, Arduino Leonardo, and MQTT to connect physical puzzles with digital triggers and sensors.

title: Travel Planner App
summary: Responsive full-stack travel planner with live weather updates via OpenWeather API, custom routing, and server-side caching for faster load times.

title: Hobby Helper App
summary: Cross-platform mobile app built with React Native and Expo to help users discover, track, and organize hobbies. Includes Node.js backend and MongoDB database.
